title: Just my luck....
body:
TY Rito for free mystery giftz. 1 more ashe skin until I own all ashe skins

http://i.gyazo.com/0781f31d74339ce3494deabf95d31aa3.png

replies.body:
Why's everyone getting free mystery gifts? I think i missed out on something...

EDIT: Nvm, read the pic. Is there any Est. on when the gifts will be sent? o.o lol..

Estimated time is, at a guess, within the next 2-3 day. In the post in the news section about the mystery gifts it say 'over the next few days' and that was posted approximately 4 days ago. With the IP boost near the end of season 4 it was stated by a Rioter that it should appear within 1 week, however I don't know if it's working the same for this one.
just today i got a mystery skin from RIOT i GOT DRAGON BLADE RIVEN its soooo cool THNX RIOT
I got the Debonair Ezreal :/ It makes me really sad.

I have 2 accounts with every ashe skin. On this account i own 3 more ashe skins and on my new smurf just got gifted this http://imgur.com/wnO2T3g
godbless you rito, u know me too well
I got Woad Ashe as well :3
Still haven't got mine cx. Still waiting :)))))
